name: Bavard Rahdar

text: Excellent location by all there is to see in commercial Sandy Springs. Fun and inviting atmosphere. Great for a quick lunch or casual dinner. All the staff was cordial and friendly. We visited during rush hour, they were busy and missed a few things but quickly made up. Fantastic attitude and good food $$

name: Jay A
text: Great customer service which always is a plus. Food was delicious as well. I will definitely come back for my next outing.

name: C Cassidy
text: Good pizza and great salads, with lots of wine and beer selections. The staff is usually very attentive, and a manager will stop by to say hi. Trivia is fun, and the host and the music selections are good. We didn‚Äôt do so good (first time) but the questions were fun.

name: Jarrett Kirby
text: Fantastic food, great service, and one of the more easy to navigate parking lots in the area. Definitely a good value and variety of food!

name: Ky Parker
text: Easy in and put for curbside for call-ahead pickup. Staff is friendly EVERY time I've ever visited!

name: Kathie Larkin
text: The staff and management couldn't be better.  We fed 100+ people in under an hour.  Organized and professional service and the food was delicious.  If you are planning a group event, this is the place to go.  Matt Brooks, the manager, knows exactly what he is doing! Great food! Great service!

name: Mary Urdaneta Keller
text: Always great service and amazing food!

name: James Barnett
text: I love their Pacific Rim pizza! It has ham, pineapple, bacon, jalapenos and caramelized onions. This is a picture of it. Kind of pricey but delicious. I don't feel like a fat P.O.S. after eating this pizza like I do with some greasier pizzas. Highly recommended.

name: Hakim
text: It made my mushroom mellow

name: Barry Smith
text: I love this place. Their pies are outstanding, and they're nice enough to let you come in and sit down a few minutes before they technically open. I want to give them 5 stars, but their pizzas are so expensive. So. Freaking. Expensive. ‚Ä¶More

name: Beth Rehbein
text: Great food! Great service! Large quantities and good ambiance.

name: Logan Britt

text: Food is always delicious. Indoor/outdoor dining. Waitress kinda sucks, her attitude was fairly nasty. Parking is ok. There is wheelchair access and limited bar. Everyone seems to be enjoying themselves. Not all of the waitresses and waiters are nasty, just the one I got

name: Erick Larson

text: Walking in expecting good food. Sorry, but that was the opposite of what we received. Drinks were flat, pizza was over cooked and service was slow not to mention feeling a bit sick afterwards. We may have visited on an off day...but we just didn't enjoy our visit.

text: Always been my favorite. Got a speciality pizza but wish I had just gotten plain cheese. Still love it though.

name: Tyler Bugbee

text: I would definitely recommend!!!

name: Charles
text: I love this place. The pizza is fantastic, the salad bowls are interesting and well thought out. (You'll see when you order one.) The shirts are hilarious. The staff is friendly, and the prices are as expected. You're going to enjoy the entire experience being here, and you'll leave full. What more could you want?

text: Good food. Appetizer took too long,  but manager comp it. Server was great. If appetizer would have not taken long, 5 stars would have been given. Maybe next time.

text: Although the kitchen got backed up (broken oven) and our food took awhile, our lovely server and the manager on duty were very honest and apologetic about the situation. text: Mellow Mushroom has the best gluten-free pizza ever! The only other place I've ever liked the GF pizza was in Rome, Italy, and it's a lot less expensive to drive to Mellow Mushroom. The staff is super friendly, the atmosphere is clean and appealing, and the food is outstanding.

text: The food here is pretty good. I ordered a Mighty Meaty pizza for my cousins and me, and we believed it was delicious. The service was pleasant and the server Brittany was delightful. I intend to return and bring more friends!

text: Another case where I was served non vegetarian food when clearly asked for vegetarian pizza. Waitress was ready to accept bill, but I spoke to manager and he accepted the mistake and got it sorted out. We were given another pizza, wasn't a nice dining experience on a weekend. I may change my view on another visit though.
